attributes.title: Dont do it
attributes.review: If you think you should vote for him. Look up the 14 points and see how many hes checked off. (Hes checked off almost all of them)

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: This app made my phone completely shut down. I had to pay to get it fixed and the technician said that this app broke my phone.

attributes.title: App has serious bugs
attributes.review:
This app completely froze my phone to the point where I had to restart it.

But hey, don’t fix it please ❤️🙏

attributes.title: No😔💅🏽✨
attributes.review: Once I open the app I got glitches. Then the FBI came to my door, and told me that voting for the orange God was illegal. They said to delete the app. And never download it again. This app is horrible.💅🏽 period ✨

attributes.title: Worst App ever
attributes.review: I just wanted to check the app out, and it's the worst. My phone kept freezing. I do not recommend using this app at all. Worst download ever.

attributes.title: Worst App Ever
attributes.review: This app steals your information and works horribly. I couldn’t even open it most of the time. If I could so negative starts I would 😡😤

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: I wanted to vote for trump, but now seeing the quality of this? nah. took hours to download, and it crashed all the time! would not recommend

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to find rally’s but all I could buy tickets for were trash stuff. If I could give 0 stars I would

attributes.title: Totally Slows Ur Phone
